participants.name: Anthony Galvin
participants.title: Looking for a Lead Mobile Engineer/Architect Contract to Hire (Manage Android/iOS) Chicago

messages.message:
Sr. Full Stack XP Developer - Contract to Hire Tempe, AZ
anthony@ptechpartners.com
What is the XP in agile XP?
It stands for Window Operating System. The "XP" originally stood for "eXPerience" .
You know that's not supported anymore right? There are unpatched security flaws and you're using it to manage personal information.

Not my project Brian but I think if you're interested in finding out what the intent of the project is, it would be a great question for the hiring manager, who I'm sure has a logical answer. Are you interested in next steps? If so, please send me your updated resume to 
Anthony@ptechpartners.com
 and we can have a short chat.
Sure, whats the name of the company?
